content.question: Which of the following best explains how President Vladimir Putin’s policy in Ukraine sustains the political legitimacy of the Russian government?

choices.label: Russians overwhelmingly support efforts by their military to reestablish the territories of the U.S.S.R.
Putin is seen by many Russians as acting in opposition to foreign meddling in Russia’s sphere of influence.
Popular support of Russian oligarchs' political influence has surged due to Putin’s actions regarding Ukraine.
Opinion polls indicate that most Russians support a return of a Marxist command economy in Russia and neighboring countries.

content.answer: Putin is seen by many Russians as acting in opposition to foreign meddling in Russia’s sphere of influence.
